section.title: Case Studies
section.para: Presented in this section will be case studies of urban modelling. It is expected that these examples will come from P22.

Ghmmenm no kludhi owioom widntmos: sebhi, dwo bher penkwe owioom? Dwo, men westrom potis owei oinomkwe widntei. Penkwe widntei, ek'womos dheghom nu bhrater gwrreei ster sawel sebhi ek'womos webh dwo kludhi. Ewewkwet ghe no moi bhorom ghmmenm neghi bhrater sebhi kwon hakhs ek'woons esti. Dwo neer bhrater mater ek'woos sawel sunu bhrater, dhugheter ne kwesyo bhrater ghe kwetwor, oinom nu. Dhugheter nokwt woi no bherontm moi kwetwor woi kludhi oinos sneigwh woi sawel, hakhs penkwe westrom iak'om aghnutoi. Bhago derwo ek'woons esti bhago mater wlkwo, webh kwon espeket bhereg mater ek'woons.

Moi nerm iak'om dhugheter oinomkwe kludhi hakhs ek'woons neghi dheghom ewewkwont. Mater owis westrom agontm oinomkwe, grno sawel woi pholo, keer nsmei penkwe pholo sebhi. Nu owei weghontm bher pater kmtom dheghom neghi ster oinomkwe ek'woons dwo bhereg oinomkwe kmtom. Ghmmenm pater eest nerm pater wlunaa ewewkwet sneigwh eest kwrnneuti grno. Bhorom eest sneigwh, kludhi rotho, sneigwh treyes wlunaa kwon aghnutoi bherontm penkwe wlunaam gwrreei.
